Description:
Office Manager (German)The office manager is responsible to overseeing general office operation and ensure the smooth running of the office on a day-to-day basis.Responsible for managing the activities of the CEO’s Office and oversee the provision of administrative support to include handling information of a highly important and confidential nature.
Coordinate and liaise with internal and external resources and clients.
Work with team members to obtain information and cascade requests as required to meet deadlines.
Responsible for researching, compiling and maintaining special reports, presentations, contact details, organization charts, etc.
Prepare and manage the issuance of various documents (letters, memos, correspondence, agendas, notes and minutes of meetings) as requested by management.
Monitor and coordinate KPIs with all departments and prepare report as per best practice ensuring employees are working towards achievement of these objectives.
Oversee office interactions, responding to requests and questions.
Plan and arrange schedules and budgets.
Create presentations and other management-level reports.
Proactively manage appointment scheduling, coordinate meetings and managing calendars and schedules, including Board of Directors meetings, record and distribute minutes of meetings.
Oversee and maintain office equipment for uninterrupted function, identify and fulfill office supply needs, maintain and manage vendors, and coordinate food delivery as needed.
Manage all aspects of the office’s space/infrastructure planning (moves, adds, and changes to workstations) and provide answers, resources, and solutions as requested
Provide direct administrative supports as needed, including scheduling appointments, meetings, and events, booking travel, maintaining filing system, mailing and shipping packages.
Arrange programs, events, or conferences by arranging for facilities, issuing information or invitations, coordinating speakers, and controlling event budget.
Transcribe dictation, and compose and prepare confidential correspondence, reports, and other complex documents.
Coordinate reception of high-level guests and visiting delegations.
Arrange complex and detailed travel plans and itineraries; compile documents for travel-related meetings.
Assemble and analyze information, prepare reports, and agendas.
Maintain files, keep records, compile reports and process documents in a timely manner.
Implement established policies and procedures, develop administrative procedures and offer suggestions for process improvements.
Exhibit behavior consistent with company code of conduct and QHSE Management System in line with:
ISO 9001
ISO 14001
ISO 45001
Perform other duties related to the job as assigned by the Direct Management.Skills
Skills:
Candidate must possess proficiency in English and German languages, verbal and written communication skills.
Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration and or any other equivalent.
5 –6 years of proven experience in office management experience.
High level of communication and organizational skills.
Proficiency in English and German languages verbal and written communication skills.
Previous experience of having managed a range of support functions & demonstrating leadership skills with the ability to improve organizational effectiveness.
Must exhibit strong time management and organizational skills, and possess the ability to multi-task.
Must be able to work in a high-stress, fast paced environment and demonstrate the flexibility required to handle a very dynamic work environment.
A high level of accuracy ,attention to details and Ability to handle confidential information.
Must possess professional interpersonal skills and the ability to work well with others, as well as the ability to work independently, in a fast paced environment with changing priorities.
Advanced computer skills and experience with online platforms
Proficiency Microsoft Office (Word, PowerPoint, Excel), with aptitude to learn new software and systems.
Problem solving abilities.
Desired start date: As soon as possible
